sense.def:
-fold
dodamo številu, če hočemo povedati, da ima nekaj določeno število vrst ali delov.

seg.quote: The problems were two-fold: it was difficult to get finance, and there weren't enough trained people available.

sense.def:
-fold
uporabljamo tudi, kadar želimo povedati, da je nekaj pomnoženo z določenim številom.

seg.quote: Even if we multiplied it ten-fold, that would still only be thirty per cent.
